Object.Field: LKM File to Hive LOAD DATA Direct
SNP_TRT : LKM File to Hive LOAD DATA

COMPONENT NAME: LKM File to Hive LOAD DATA Direct COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 and above DESCRIPTION: Direct integration from a flat file into Hive without any staging using Hive's LOAD DATA command. This is a direct load LKM and must be used without any IKM. Additional information can be found on KM option descriptions. The KM can handle filename wildcards (*, ?).
Please see BigDataConnector Documentation for more details.

Check this option, if you wish to create the target table. Default: false In case of USE_STAGING_TABLE = false, please note that data will only be read correctly, if the target table definition, particularly the row format and file format details, are correct.

Set this option to true, if you wish to replace the target table/partition content with the new data. Otherwise the new data will be appended to the target table. Default: true - Permitted values: true or false If TRUNCATE=false and USE_STAGING_TABLE=false, all source file names must be unique and must not collide with any data files already loaded into the target table.
SNP_TRT : LKM File to Hive LOAD DATA #SNP_LINETRT : Load Data File
SNP_TRT : HiveBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Create Temporary Indexes on Stage
SNP_TRT : HiveBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Drop Temporary Indexes on Stage
